DAO/voting
Establish a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) for the Emojicoins project, allowing coin owners to participate in major decisions for the project.

Gallery on Voxels
Create a promotional gallery within the Voxels.com metaverse to showcase the project and provide a social space for users. All .vox models are supported.

Other metaverses (Decentraland/Sandbox)
Explore the possibility of expanding the Emojicoins project to other popular metaverses, such as Decentraland and Sandbox. This could provide new opportunities for users to interact with the Emojicoins in different virtual environments.
